description: Ms. codex. Title supplied by cataloger. Physical description: 31 lines per page; written in small naskh in black on glazed, laid European paper. Rubrication and catchwords. Heavy damp staining across upper margin and first few lines of text in last quarter of manuscript. Origin: 13 Jumādá I 1262 [9 May 1846], by Aḥmad najl al-marḥūm al-Sayyid Ṣ̄āliḥ khalaf al-mabrūr al-Sayyid Qāsim al-Faḥḥām al-Najafī (leaf 196b). Incipit: كتاب الزكاة التي هي لغة الطهارة ومنه قتلت نفسا زكية
author: Najafī, Muḥammad Ḥasan ibn Bāqir, approximately 1788-1850
abstract: Commentary on al-Muḥaqqiq al-Ḥillī's Sharāʼiʻ al-Islām; contains Kitāb al-zakāh through Kitāb al-iʻtikāf. Same scribe as New Series no. 346q and 359q.
extent: 197 leaves : paper ; 307 x 210 (222 x 122) mm bound to 313 x 212 mm
title: [Section from Jawāhir al-kalām fī sharḥ Sharāʼiʻ al-Islām].
uniform_title: جواهر الكلام في شرح شرائع الاسلام. كتاب الزكاه-كتاب الاعتكاف
creator: نجفي، محمد حسن بن باقر، approximately 1788-1850
subject: Muḥaqqiq al-Ḥillī, Jaʻfar ibn al-Ḥasan, 1205 or 1206-1277—Sharāʼiʻ al-Islām.
binding_note: Contemporary full maroon leather with gold-stamped central mandorla and pendants and blind-stamped fillets; yellow paper doublures.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
